content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position x)

### Assembling machine factory at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Stone furnace (position b) and burner mining drill (position c)

### Electricity generator at position(d)
Consists of steam engine (position e), boiler (position f), and offshore pump (position g)

### Copper plate mine at position(h)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position i) and a furnace at position(j)
- Burner mining drill (position k) and a furnace at position(l)
- Burner mining drill (position m) and a furnace at position(n)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting and inserting items
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to craft or insert them. For example, ensure you have enough automation science packs before trying to insert them into the lab.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
